website_summaries.verdict: Nutritionally complete daily dog treat designed to help eliminate plaque and tartar and freshen breath. Available in sizes to suit all breeds.
pros: Texture designed to allow teeth cleaning down to the gumline
Removes plaque and tartar, freshens breath
Available in numerous flavors and formulas targeted for specific concerns

customer_reviews.title: She died on NY Eve
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's coincidence, but Greenies were the only thing different in my malti-poo's routine. After one-a-day for a little more than a week, she got very lethargic and acted like maybe she had a bowel obstruction. We rushed her to the pet ER on New Year's Eve where we were told she was too sick to save. Here kidneys were full of sludge and her blood sugar was through the roof (compared to blood work done just 3 weeks earlier). Maybe there's no connection, but I'll always wonder.
customer_reviews.author: H. E. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 7. She has had one a day since I got her about 6 years ago. She woke up vomiting and pooping blood. Rushed to the vet and they said they hate greenies because it’s only 60 percent digestible and causes intestinal blockages. Had to take her to the emergency hospital a few days later and the vets there said they hate greenies and to not give them to pets. Greenies day that they help plaque and it’s bologna because my dogs teeth were black and the vet said it would cost 1400 to deep clean her teeth. So these treats are falsely advertised dangerous garbage.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: This size would be good for a tiny dog--a Yorkie or chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: I bought these TEENIE-sized Greenies thinking that my 13-pound terrier fell within the parameters. Wrong. He demolishes these within seconds. So, I've bought the next size up, the PETITE, and just gave him one. He's been gone for several minutes now. This size would be good for a tiny dog--a Yorkie or chihuahua. I used to break the larger ones in half, which kept him busy awhile but why when other sizes exist? I'd give the PETITE five stars for my particular dog.
customer_reviews.author: Tassie Wussell

customer_reviews.title: Even Great for Gentle Giants!
customer_reviews.text: Apollo LOVES these! At our last vet check-up, the vet said that Apollo's teeth and gums were exceptionally healthy. Although he's a Great Pyrenees, we give him these TEENIE Treats throughout the day, and he enjoys them every single time, without expanding his 'waist.'
customer_reviews.author: Pat Fifield - Author & Playwright

customer_reviews.title: It’s importanr that the company fixes the mess. I want my money back
customer_reviews.text: I have six little dogs. I gave these to them and 2 of the dogs that ate them. Got very sick. The others got diarrhea I had to go to the vet with the chihuahua. From what the vet Stated he thinks it might have been the greenie. She finally pooped a little bit and there were pieces of undigested I Greenie it cost me a large bill. She needed X-rays and blood work
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Beware test these on the weekend.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 35lb dog. I gave her the smaller ones for dogs 5-15lbs to make sure she would not have a negative reaction. THANK Goodness I did!!! She got bad diareaha for 24 hours I was up all night taking her out. I really did not notice a difference in her breath at all. I give this NO stars but had to give one to leave a review. I am really shocked that it has such good ratings. So If you decide to buy, test on the weekend so you don't have to go to work the next morning with no sleep. And come back to the house with an accident.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth Vet visits
customer_reviews.text: My dog has gotten 2 obstructions in his intestines because of these treats, never buying them again
customer_reviews.author: Laura E.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs won’t go near them
customer_reviews.text: I bought 130 of these things for my 2 Morkies based on the excellent reviews. I didn’t have any illusions about the treats being able to clean their teeth, but I thought at least it would be a good snack for them. But they won’t even go near the things. They couldn’t be less interested in them. It’s like they’re made of dog repellant. My dogs would rather lick the baseboards and the drywall than even get within an inch of these snacks. I can put one right in front of them, and they act like it’s not even there. They turn away from it. Not sure what I’m gonna do with 128 dog snacks.
customer_reviews.author: IronDioPriest

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Surprising to me, my dog really loved these! I was hopeful that her teeth would be cleaner. But unfortunately, a week after starting her on them, she started scratching her armpits constantly and then started chewing two hot spots on her back. The itching stopped as soon as I stopped giving them to her. So it's apparent that she is allergic to something in them. I suspect a wheat allergy, since that is the main ingredient. I'm so disappointed, and so is she. She really enjoyed chewing on these as a daily treat, but now I guess I'll have to find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Bunkster Brown

customer_reviews.title: Dog poop attack
customer_reviews.text: He likes eating them but it's a whole different story on the other end!!!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Troyus

customer_reviews.title: STALE, STALE, STALE....
customer_reviews.text: I order these constantly. Our 3 dogs love them. Have had a half dozen harder than usual boxes in past but this last box, the greenies were so hard, one of my pups can't eat them. She vomits them...too hard on her stomach. I think customers should be refunded or sent a new box free of charge when sub-par products arrive. Why should we go through the hassle of returning? Snapped in half, these greenies could be used as a sharp weapon. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: She

customer_reviews.title: For a 5 - 15 lb. dog these are NOT teeny.
customer_reviews.text: I was giving my two 14 lb. dogs the Greenies Breath Blasters which were small and just the right size for them. Sadly, they were discontinued, so I purchased the TEENY Original Greenies thinking they would be similar in size to the breath blasters. I was really surprised to find how much bigger they were. The sizer is rediculous for a small dog. At over 2 1/2 inches long they’re more than twice as big as the breath blasters. One piece is too much for one small dog to chew so I’m going to cut each one in half until they’re gone. Very disappointed and I won’t be purchasing these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jannyd

customer_reviews.title: I am just amazed how popular this product is but did not fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I am just amazed how popular this product is but did not fit the liking of my chorkie. He snifts on it and would turn his back away from it. Even I break into smaller pieces, he ignores them as if I am putting a punishment infront of him. Tried and tried, but same reaction form my baby. I am just pleased of Amazon's return and refund policy that I do not have to worry about wasting money on an item that is of no use to us. And this keeps me a faithful Amazoner! Thank you, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: Yorkie Gives them 4 Paws Up
customer_reviews.text: This is a subscribe and save item for our household. These greenies are highly recommended by our 15 year old yorkie. He has one for lunch every day. Around 11:45 he is standing by the pantry door waiting for his lunch. If mom or dad forget, he lets us know by barking at us until we give him his treat. I cannot speak to their breath control and he has never had bad breath (even at 15 years old) and has great teeth. He has been getting these for many years so maybe that has been a factor. Just know he loves them and is not happy without it.
customer_reviews.author: NLM4501

customer_reviews.title: Reversed my dogs dental issues
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. They are a special treat to her that she looks forward to every day. We have given her 1 a day for the past 3 months. At last years appointment the vet said that she was going to need dental surgery that would cost more than $400. At this most recent vet appointment the vet said that there was no need for surgery at this time. We give credit to the greenies for this awesome change in her dental condition!
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal Wall

customer_reviews.title: My babies love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a greenie pet owner. I do stand by this product, it does help with bad breath and also does strengthen dogs teeth, what I really like about this product is that, its puppy friendly as well, I don't recommend giving a puppy a full stick, but you can never start to early with teeth care for dogs/puppies! The price for the amount is AMAZING!! I've worked at a pet store for many years as a groomer and this is one product I tried to sell, but the price for this at a pet store is a little overpriced so when I saw that amazon was selling this, HUGE SMILE on my face!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Love large quantity, Fast ship. My girls love these
customer_reviews.text: My girls love these. I have six small Chihuahuas. Good price for big package. Good to chill unless your dogs teeth are missing. I’ve got a couple that can’t chew them but for the typical dog they love them. Which greenies sold blueberry and big boxes like this or other flavors. If these were given daily they probably would help their breath, but I can’t afford the number of dogs I have and how many bones they need on an ongoing basis LOL. Product is great though so it gets high ratings from me. Fast shipper here. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Glover

customer_reviews.title: Litttle dogs love them.
customer_reviews.text: I give my 2 old chihuahuas 12 and 17- 1 every night. I wish I can say they have no tartar but they do. But perhaps it would be much worse without this. They wont let me brush they are old and I cannot afford a dental. I give Clindamycin RX from the vet every few months for 5 days each time to keep infection at bay. Even if I had a million dollars I would be afraid to put my 17 year old 4.5 lb under anesthesia. They look forward to these as a treat. They stink but the dogs love them. I am on Subscribe and Save and get a box every 2 months .
customer_reviews.author: Lottie Dee

customer_reviews.title: Helps with bad breath, but make sure they have strong teeth
customer_reviews.text: All our dogs like these and they don't smell terrible nor do they smell good, but they are dog treats to help bad breath. We try to give them one daily or every other day. I can't say I've notice a dramatic difference but they are better then some others that claim to help bad breath. With older dogs that have lost a couple teeth these can have a tendency to get stuck in between their missing teeth. This would be true with any harder treat as these are not rock hard but firm enough to help clean off their teeth. It will not remove hardened plaque.
customer_reviews.author: A Person

customer_reviews.title: My Westie loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say what the flavor is like...but my dogs can. She loves them, literally comes unglued when I pick up the bag and she hears the noise of it rustling. This batch this time was so fresh, it smelled like green grass. She has only a few a day but she'd kill the whole big box at once if I let her. I had some doubt whether these were legit, so I called the company with the batch number and they verified they were their product. That is always a good idea when purchasing anything for a pet.
customer_reviews.author: Gael

customer_reviews.title: Chihuahua approved!
customer_reviews.text: Just as the tittle of this review, my chihuahua goes nuts every time I bring one out. So no complaints about flavor. I always give him one when I brush his teeth to complete the “job”. Although the “Teenie”options are small, I still break them in half as occasional treats. They come in well packaged and smell fresh. They are also a bit bendable so they are not harsh for the teeth. So far I have been satisfied with Greenies Treats and will continue to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Insomniak1

customer_reviews.title: Can break in half if needed and still gives results
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the only treats my Chihuahua will actually eat. She won't let me brush her teeth so she gets these as well as water additive. She is almost 9 y/o and she has only had to have 3 teeth pulled on vet cleanings. The only downside is she gets loose stools if I give her a whole one every day. Therefore, I just give her half of one and space out the days. Because they are softer, they don't work as well as a bone to scrape tarter of, but she won't chew on bones, so I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Alberts

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how effective Greenies are in fighting plaque because I only started giving them to my dog regularly (every day) one year ago, when she was 7 years old and had already accumulated noticeable plaque buildup. Perhaps if I started on them as a puppy, it would have been a great preventative measure. However, I don’t want to stop using them at this point because she loves them so much and perhaps they are doing some good.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Easy Buy
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been giving Greenies to our good boy Petey since we rescued him little over a year ago. We use them as poopy treat rewards. Petey is about 30 pounds, but looks like he works out all day since he’s a dachshund/pit mix. We don’t give him a whole treat usually, but rather break them in half to make them go a little further. His teeth are very good and clean so the stinky breath isn’t exactly what we use Greenies for, but when it does smell, the treat does seems to help! The treats come in a box with two bags in it and are 100% sealed for freshness.
customer_reviews.author: schmidty

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty ineffectual though with the teeth cleaning
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these things....gets one a day after he eats his dinner and has been for years. They are pretty ineffectual though with the teeth cleaning. I've had to take my pooch to get deep cleanings every year or so because he has so much tartar build up. His breath is no better either. Oh well, I love the guy and he loves these Greenies, so I will continue to buy them for him to munch on.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Product Was Stale When it Arrived.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered from this seller three different times and the first two were great. However, this order had stale greenies in it. The expiration date was ok, but the greenies were a very pale green, and had no aroma. My pap ate them for a couple of weeks, but then stopped. I offer him one each night, which we've done for years, but he sniffs it and walks away. I can't return it now, but I would like the seller to know this happened.
customer_reviews.author: TexasLizReynolds

customer_reviews.title: My Yorkie loves these
customer_reviews.text: My first Yorkie Breeder told me they shouldn’t have Greenies. I can’t remember why she thought that. Five Yorkies later, my vet recommended I got them for my dogs bad breath. I’m not the best at brushing her teeth since she hates it. I accidentally ordered double the quantity I wanted. I’m so glad I did! My dog loves these. Her breath is SO much better. I only give her one a day, but I’m sure she’d rather have a bowl of these than dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Faith St John

customer_reviews.title: Color is way off and texture is too.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this from Amazon for years and have always been happy with them.. This is the first time this has happened. I'm not sure why they look like this and not comfortable giving them to our dog. I will send them back if you would send me a new box. Thank you. Jeannine
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Best Price on the Internet!
customer_reviews.text: Our three dogs are all in love with these treats so we choose the smallest size to accommodate the Chihuahua (Princess Mushka in the photo) and the larger dogs just get 2-3 treats each time. Wonderful price and having them on auto-delivery is brilliant so we never run out of their treats. Great training treat too.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha H.

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Loves them!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 9 week old Toy Poodle. He has awful breath when we got him. A friend to me to get these and Puppy LOVES them. I wish I could give him more than one a day. It's a great distractor when he starts chewing what he isn't supposed to. The texture does get a little gummy (almost slimy) after he has been chewing something for a while but apparently all things having to do with puppies get gummy. gooey and slimy
customer_reviews.author: D EVANS

customer_reviews.title: My dogs favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves Greenies! When we are outside on our morning walk, all I need to say is “want your Greenie?” and he runs to the house. If I don’t give it to him right away, he will sit and stare at the cabinet I keep them in. I can’t even say the word Greenie around him so I spell it when I am talking to my family about them. Not sure that they actually help with his tartar but he loves them so we will keep buying them!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Helps with dental care
customer_reviews.text: I have been routinely giving my dogs a greenie at the end of the day. They literally wait by the drawer they are stored in when it is greenie time, so obviously the dogs love them. I had my 9 year old dog to the vet last month and she said, what ever you are doing for her teeth....keep doing it!!! Last year, I was told she would need a dental soon, so I have to credit these greenies with her overall dental improvement! I'm good with not having the $300+ dental service!!!
customer_reviews.author: CaanuLope

customer_reviews.title: Great product with shoddy shipping
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product but whoever packaged and shipped these did a terrible job of making sure they stayed safe. The box was crushed and opened!!!! Thank god the inner packs were still sealed 🙄. These work wonders though! Me and my husbands dogs breath was a new level of rank when we ran out of these little miracle workers! For about two weeks we weren’t able to buy her any more and oh boy....we could tell she hadn’t had her greenies. They’re more than worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Beau.My.Dude

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these greenies
customer_reviews.text: Besides being good for my dog's teeth, these can be used as a treat which is a double win for us. This is handy for those days where we don't have time to brush her teeth which we try to do daily. Unfortunately, I don't think it helps much with her breath. We bought the teenie version since she falls within that weight category but she eats it up pretty quickly. These greenies are expensive so whenever there's a sale, I usually try to stock up on some.
customer_reviews.author: HF

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love Greenies!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old poodle and 4 year old shih tzu LOVES these treats. I have been giving them to them for their whole lives and everyday when I am leaving for work they get so excited to "brush their teeth." I know this will not be the case with every dog, but I have not had to have either dog's teeth cleaned by the veterinarian and every visit they say their teeth look good and they don't have bad breath.
customer_reviews.author: jrbush91

customer_reviews.title: 7 chi mama
customer_reviews.text: These are great ; I can always rely on amazon to get these to me and for a good price. Our dogs know what “do you want a greenie” means lol! We give them every morning to all 7 of our dogs , they are the cheapest for us with all our dogs and I honestly don’t have any complaints thus far and we’ve been giving them to them for almost a year. I have noticed plaque reduction, we have chihuahuas
customer_reviews.author: dangstef

customer_reviews.title: My dogs go crazy for these
customer_reviews.text: I have NO idea why my dogs love these so much, but they do. I actually stopped buying them for a while because one of my dogs will whine all day for them. Super annoying. Alas - their breath! UGH. So I started buying them again and sheesh - they go nuts. By far, hands down, their favorite favorite treat. And look - it really helps with their breath - so I will put up with their whining for more of these. Great product for both dog moms and dogs alike. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but I Think Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I buy these tiny Greenies for my 75lb mutts, they get them after a daily tooth brushing to try and improve their teeth. I don’t think these treats have made a noticeable different in their oral health but they certainly enjoy them and it makes me feel better. The smaller treats means I can give them a little more often - dogs love it and it keeps them at an ideal weight better!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Hoy

customer_reviews.title: Greenies for my dog's pearly whites
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves Greenies so much that I can't even say the word out loud or she starts doing every trick she knows to try to convince me to give her one. Her teeth are clean and her breath is fresh, and she always gets great checkups from her vet and her doggie dentist. In fact, at 8 years old, her teeth are in such good condition that she doesn't need anesthesia for her teeth cleaning. That makes us both very happy. My only fear is that she will learn what G-R-E-E-N-I-E-S means and I'll no longer be able to just spell it when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: PBinValencia

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Like Them - This is What They Told me to Write
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving these dental chews to my dogs for several years. My vet told me that dogs don't need a lot of these, so now I purchase the teenie ones and split one in half with scissors for my small dogs. I give one teenie one to my 100 pound "puppy" and the vet says that is enough. Vet also said not to give them these every day, month after month. Take a month off every once in a while. I have noticed "some" improvement with breath, and I do think they make some difference with teeth cleanliness, but nothing beats a professional teeth cleaning by the vet.
customer_reviews.author: 1912 House

customer_reviews.title: Helps your dog's teeth
customer_reviews.text: Our Chihuahua Nicky loves these treats. He's 14 years old now and when we took him to get his teeth cleaned for the first time last Spring, the technician said that although he had never had his teeth cleaned, he had the teeth of a dog less than half his age. We can't get out of the house without throwing him one to quiet him down. he has been eating them for close to 10 years now!
customer_reviews.author: John R. Clark

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Love These
customer_reviews.text: I can't really say I love the flavor, but my dogs love these so that's always a good thing. I give them one treat every day and they just go crazy. They know that once I take out the bag, they'll be getting their treat. I'm not quite sure how effective this is because I still brush my dogs teeth every few days. But they haven't gotten any reaction to it - no allergies or stomach problem so I'm assuming it's good for them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jo Custodio

customer_reviews.title: Splurge and buy these
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahua is a particular beast but very accommodating when it comes to what she eats. One day, I made the mistake of replacing Greenies with a store brand and while my dog gladly took her treats with her I'd estimate that 80% of them ended up in an uneaten pile by her bed. She's a sweet dog that didn't want to disappoint me. So, I went back and ordered a ton of Greenies and the piles haven't reappeared. My dog loves them. Go ahead and buy some, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MiamiMe

customer_reviews.title: Doggo goes nuts for these
customer_reviews.text: My doggo loves these. But he also eats poo, so he’s not that discerning. They seem to help with his hot breath, which is why I got them and he will do anything I ask when I produce them, so yay for me remaining the alpha dog in this household. I’m including a photo of my dog, because he’s awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ladi

customer_reviews.title: My Yorkie and Morkie love these as daily treats
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving these to my 5 year old Yorkie. He loves them and I do notice that his teeth are cleaner. We just rescued a 6 year old Morkie and she loves them too. She had her teeth cleaned when we got her and after a month they are still just as clean. We go to get the mail every day and they know when we get back, they get a Greenie as a treat.
customer_reviews.author: SAMPorter

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these greenie treats and just eat them up daily! I would never have imagined they would like these treats, much less the original flavor, but they LOVE them! I am glad I finally found a treat that is good for their gum and teeth health that they like. For the price the value is great. I would recommend these treat to anyone looking to prevent dental damage or to a dog needing preventative dental care! I found this at my vet's office and have never looked back since! I will continue to buy these treats and give them once daily to my pets.
customer_reviews.author: Aubsmommmy

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: Our dog, the neighbor's dog and all the dogs in the neighborhood love these chews --therefore, they don't last long. Because our girl is a little on the round side, we break these in half for her. She gets twice the "treat" fun for just one chew. Works out great for both of us. This is the one chew that doesn't seem to upset her digestive system in any way and for that I am very grateful. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Lakeside Gramma

customer_reviews.title: My rescue loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My Chocolate Lab-Chesapeake Bay Retriever rescue dog had Greenies for the first time today. She is now an addict! She’s a bit finicky about treats but after getting a taste of the first one, she was quickly back for more. Even though she’s a big dog I got the box of small Greenies for her as her teeth aren’t in the best condition. As soon as I opened the package, all three of my cats magically appeared, too, so now I’m ordering Cat Greenies! Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnyts

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. She is 14 lbs and I give her the teeny ones. I've noticed green in her poop and her stool is weird so I started giving her 1/2 of one every couple of days. I'm going to keep an eye on her to see if it is the greenies that are upsetting her tummy. I have been buying these for a few years so I'm worried I might have gotten a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Cheese

customer_reviews.title: She's never turns down a treat or a chew of any kind
customer_reviews.text: I bought a hundred and thirty of these, I couldn't find any to try before I ordered so I took a chance. hope your dog likes them better than mine. She's not picky dog and she jumps away from them like they smell bad or something not sure what's going on inside her little head. Regardless of the problem you cannot return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Zzzz

customer_reviews.title: He loves them
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My dog loves them, but unfortunately he waits me up early every morning and then runs, sits and waits in front of the table where they are kept until he receives it. You must be sure to reseal the package each time you open it or they will dry out and become hard as a rock. Keeping it sealed also helps to keep the scent from escaping from the bag. It's not a pleasant scent as one would think.
customer_reviews.author: JazzmanTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: My doggies’ favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried to give my dogs about 10 different dental chews, but they wont eat anything like how they eat greenies. It is absolutely their number one favorite dental treat. Some of the other knock off brands dont even phase my dogs. Only thing is they chew and eat them up within seconds so im not sure how much cleaning it is really doing. Seems good though!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: PJ loves these
customer_reviews.text: Our poodle sure loves these. He reminds me every night about 7:30 that it's time... Lots of "natural" pet experts tell stories about these being indigestible, and he'll poop them out in strings, etc. Not PJ. No discernible ill effects and he just won't go without one a day. We feed all top-quality organic food, nothing grocery store, but these are his guilty pleasure...
customer_reviews.author: Karl Vacek

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Value!  Large bag protect product from spoiling!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these but they are really expensive to purchase at my local pet store. This is an outstanding value. I did purchase the 96 piece teenies, and the expiration date on the package is in 2018. But, since there is 96 and I opened the bag, I will take portions of a week or two and vacuum seal them, so that the product does not spoil. I am impressed with the service and price, I will never buy these at my local pet store again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M  - Michigan

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the smell but my dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: I can't really see any improvement in the color of my dog's teeth but her breath is better although I would not call it minty fresh. Having gotten through both bags the only thing I can say for certain is that my dog loves them. There seems to be some improvement in the breath but it's subjective at best but I'm going to give the benefit of the doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger88

customer_reviews.title: Great deal snagged
customer_reviews.text: I got these during thanksgiving week when they had an unbelievable sale on greenies. I think I got one for like $15. The shipment came fast. The expiration dates for all of the content are May 2020, which is not that far from today. Maybe this explains why it was so cheap. But the product seems like the real greenies as the dogs continue to enjoy them and digest them without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Smartypants

customer_reviews.title: My pup's favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what makes this so delicious, but my dog goes nuts over greenies! He even knows the word "greenies". We've tried the Costco version and he refused to eat them, so I guess my dog's loyal to this brand haha. I wish they were cheaper but they make my dog happy. Not too sure how well they work in cleaning teeth, but that's fine with me considering how happy he is
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: only treat my yorkie likes
customer_reviews.text: my seven year old yorkie will eat other treats but when he hears the greenie bag he just runs around excitedly and then sits patiently until we give it to him. he has been eating these treats his whole life and no matter how many times I try to give him something different, he has the same excited reaction to greenies. will continue to purchase for him!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle See

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy, Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my "Taco Bell" dog! She absolutely loves these so I took to Amazon, once again and sure enough, I easily found them and best of all they were much more cheaper than buying them at where I originally found them as well as other stores I shopped at(for best price) but Amazon had them not only cheaper but larger quantity for the same price of less amount at places mentioned above. They also really do clean your dog's teeth, no matter his/her size! (Sizes for all Dog's in chart) they're also healthy for your dog(s) too!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Glackin

customer_reviews.title: Be careful to read the small writing of "for dogs 5-15lbs"
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a small pack of these while Christmas Shopping for my Doberman. Didn't notice the 5-15lbs, which I guess is my fault, but was really dang upset to have spent the money on what could have been a major choking hazard for my dog. I wish they had multiple size options on this one posting so you could tell.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie N.

customer_reviews.title: Vet opinion
customer_reviews.text: After buying the product I checked with my vet. They absolutely do NOT recommend using this product which has caused death in dogs. It has been reworked but vet still won't recommend because it was not properly tested on the original roll out so how can we trust the rework? Won't be buying again.... buying the product my vet recommends which Amazon also carries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our dog LOVES them
customer_reviews.text: Our little Papillon gets one a day, right after her last trip outside each night. When my wife gets her 'greenie' out of the container, if she is too slow in offering it our dog will go through almost every trick she knows in order to speed up the process. It's really a 'hoot' to watch. Once she gets it she runs as fast as she can to her spot in the living room in order to enjoy her treat and relax.
customer_reviews.author: GTOutwest

customer_reviews.title: Great product, my dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this Greenies dog treat. I give him a piece as a reward after he ate his meal. As a result, he would eat his dried food very fast and came to ask me for this dog treat. I have tried to switch the one made by Amazon before because it's cheaper; but my dog didn't like it as much as this product. So I have to buy this dog treat for him.
customer_reviews.author: novice trader

customer_reviews.title: Not all Greenies were fresh in the bag
customer_reviews.text: Opened the bag to give my dog a greenie and I grabbed one that was not soft or pliable ...I'd say about half the first bag was stale ! Broke right in half when I twisted it..which is what I normally do ,I give it to my lil dog in 2 pieces. Never buy a bulk bag again. I haven't opened the second one yet but I'm super disappointed. Next time I'll go to PetSmart
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Four paws up!
customer_reviews.text: Chloe Ann (the ferocious dachshund) gives these four paws up. She looks forward to getting her Greenie everyday after lunch. She devours it. I can't tell you about the flavor because she won't let me have one. I have no idea if the scent is pleasant for her but she does devour it, so I assume she approves.
customer_reviews.author: bkhs81

customer_reviews.title: What do you put in these thing?
customer_reviews.text: What do put in these treats. My dog is addicted to them. However, I must say without them I would have had a hard time house breaking my dog. I buy the Teenies and cut them in half. No need to give a 15lb and below a full treat. Greenies along with praise will help you to train your dog to do almost anything.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It does its job
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these for my little boy, he loved them with a passion, but now he gets excited to see the bag and buries his greenie somewhere and leaves it to dry out to the point I have to throw it away. The only way he will eat it is if I hold it for him. Aside from having a picky chihuahua, they do their job, they leave his breath smelling 10x better for most of the day. I haven't noticed his teeth being cleaner or whiter but I only got them because he doesn't let me clean his back teeth with a tooth brush anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: My dog absolutely loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes nuts for these! He knows he gets one after his supper and he will come sit in front of me and just stare until I give him one. He plays with it, throwing it around and than eats it was great pleasure. I don’t know if they are helping his teeth but they sure make him a happy dog and that makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: happyladi

customer_reviews.title: How is this Healthy for your Dog?
customer_reviews.text: Greenies made both of our pups ill. According to information we read, Cellulose is not healthy for a dog. Greenies are made of Cellulose. What ingredients are for dental care?.... Could not find any in this product. Greenies has done a great job marketing their product.... but is it truly healthy for your dog's life. Please do your research.... we did ours a little late, regretfully.
customer_reviews.author: T. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves her Greenies 😁👏
customer_reviews.text: My maltipoo loves these tiny bones! She doesn’t play with toys but she uses her Greenies dental bones as a treat and teases herself by using her nose to “bury” it in her blanket that I gave her when I first rescued her in 2011. It helps to clean her teeth and she has fun too. She does the same thing with similar treats, and waits for me to watch her sometimes because I get such a kick out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Lady

customer_reviews.title: Fixed the stank coming from our dogs pie hole.
customer_reviews.text: My 4lb yorkie shitzhu mix has stinky puppy breath. I am not sure if she was staying up late smoking my cigars and eating whole cloves of garlic but it sure smelled like she was. Everyone commented on her breath. I just realized today that she no longer has stinky breath. Been giving her one of these a day when I put her in her kennel. Much cheaper on amazon than I could find in the store
customer_reviews.author: howlin at the moon

customer_reviews.title: Dogs dig em. 🐶
customer_reviews.text: My pups love these things and they really do seem to work on their teeth. I go back-and-forth between regular bones and greenies. Seems to be working well. This is also a better price than what I can find in pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these when my rehomed pup was 7 months old as I wanted to get a jump on dental care. I researched and these were the most economical, recommended chews for teeth and gums. Bonus is my pup loves them and gets one every morning. Still do intermittent toothbrushing but don't feel as bad missing a day with these. Will definitely reorder!
customer_reviews.author: Denise E.

customer_reviews.title: Pomeranian will invoke all manner of moral coercion/extortion to get a daily fix
customer_reviews.text: I consider that this product is overly expensive; but our Pomeranian will invoke all manner of moral coercion/extortion to ensure that we continue to purchase. I have no idea of its potential dental benefits and it is demanded more as a treat......... I assume much as an addict craves a fix.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: No more dog breath
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving these to my dogs for several years and they truly work as advertised. My dogs like the flavor and chewiness as well. These treats, combined with regular tooth brushing, have helped my dogs' teeth stay healthy and free of the dreaded dog breath. Unfortunately, I have received bags on occasion that seem to be from older stock (pieces are a little dry, though still edible). It's for this reason that I can't give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them. Lower price than store
customer_reviews.text: These are the same Greenies we've been buying for years. Our dog loves them as a tasty treat and our vet recommends them to maintain healthy teeth though not as a substitute for professional dental care. We buy them on Amazon because the price is much lower than the local pet store. Update: The 65 piece bag was out of stock so bought the 130 unit box. When opened, discovered inside were two 65 unit bags for less than buying them individually so even a greater bargain. Dog still loves them and looks forward to receiving one every morning.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lieberman

customer_reviews.title: Sterling loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My dog knows he gets one every morning before I leave for school. He will go outside potty as fast as he can and then race back inside to get his greenie. He will refuse all other treats until he has his morning greenie. He was at the vet last year for vaccine updates and was told he should also get a dental, but when he went in last week the vet said his teeth look good with minimal tarter build up! The price on amazon is a million times better than in the store and this is our 3rd box and will continue getting these to keep our babies teeth clean and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wal

customer_reviews.title: Beware Marketing Trickery
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to teach old owners new tricks, but surprise! These do nothing for dental health. Although I have been giving my dogs daily Greenies for years, I finally caught on, as their dental bills began piling up. The dogs don't care what they are labeled. To dogs Greenies are, then and now, simply a yummy treat. The joke is on us. Buy as a pricey dog treat if you wish. For me, it's too late to change my dog's routine. Just be aware that it is a cookie hiding behind the green box!
customer_reviews.author: veronica disney

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves em..Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: My dog is picky when it comes to treats. She loves this one. It doesn't really help with her breath. Being made in the UNITED STATES is a KEY factor. Least I am confident that the factory that makes them is being checked by the health department. Something they don't have in China.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan N.

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: I only give my dog one a night as instructions say so. I purchased so many because of the price. I put un opened bags in the freezer. I take a good handful and put in a zip lock back to last a few weeks at a time for the pantry and easy access. as needed. The freezer keeps them fresh. This box lasted several months.
customer_reviews.author: nancy sanford

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Treat Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase after reading some of the bad reviews. I thought I would at least give it a try for the great price! I dumped the whole bag out and checked for worms-like other reviews warned about. I even waited s few days. Everything seemed fine. I was very satisfied with these and my dogs love them. Within a week their horrible breath was gone and I noticed a drastic difference in the amount of plaque build up they now don't have.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: My doggie loves them, that's what is important.
customer_reviews.text: First, I do not eat them so I really can not claim their freshness or flavor. But my doggie, Annie, gives them rave reviews. I love, as a senior, during this pandemic that we can still stimulate the economy on-line without risking my health or the health of others. It's a treat for Annie, as well as me.
customer_reviews.author: Marn

customer_reviews.title: My puppies are greenie-heads.
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs have apparently grown alarm clocks in their brains, because they start whining at 12:30 every day, so I’ll take them outside to play and then bring them back in for a “big T”. (The Jack Russell Terrorist has learned to spell, so we can’t even spell out t-r-e-a-t anymore.) One of these a day is all they get, and they enjoy the ritual. Apparently, these things taste pretty good. It also helps their breath...until they go out and find duck poop.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A. White

customer_reviews.title: My picky ratchi goes bonkers over her daily greenie
customer_reviews.text: I have a small Ratchi who goes absolutely nuts for these. Don’t get me wrong, she gets excited over treats of all kinds, but she loves greenies to the point that she will try to do every trick in the book all at once to get one. It’s great that they are also good for her teeth, because before I tried these, she had to have 14 teeth removed. I definitely would reccomend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy Greenies online.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a large box, containing 2 bags. The 1st bag was fine, but upon opening the 2nd bag, the Greenies had no moisture and were hard and instead of jumping for joy for a Greenie now, she is complacent, will lick it and walk away. I don’t know how to make them moist again and I am stuck with a large bag of hard Greenies.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Anderson

customer_reviews.title: 43 Treats Size Greenies Dog Dental Chews Dog Treats - Teenie Size ( 5-15 lb Dogs)
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, the scent is a small bit unexpected but it does the job, Both my Vet and Groomers recommend this product and said it suppose to clean our dogs teeth, works against tartar and plaque and freshens out dogs doggy breath, so far my our dogs breath is improving. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: My wolf pup loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My little wolf pup(Shih Tzu) seems to love these. And he’s a rescue with painful teeth and gums but he’ll still will go for chewing these up. Glad to have another positive to add to helping my little boy restore his dental health. Poor little guy please say a little prayer for him ...he’s been through so much.
customer_reviews.author: bemorewise

customer_reviews.title: Healthy treats for dogs.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love greenies. It has become a nightly ritual to give them one after the last outing of the day. I prefer the blueberry flavor because it smells better, but my dogs don’t seem to notice the difference. They’re happy to get them anytime. The teenies are a great size for my Yorkie and Boston terrier.
customer_reviews.author: Born to Read

customer_reviews.title: Bad side effects on my dog.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased greenies due to the great reviews. During this time my pup developed loose stools. I changed his food, threw out dog treats. Finally, I came across an article on the internet regarding the effects of "Greenies" on some dogs. Some symptoms include diarrhea. Once I stopped giving him these treats, his stools were back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Rose in Scottsdale

customer_reviews.title: EEKS! Worm eggs and hatchlings.
customer_reviews.text: Opened one package last week and within days, worms and eggs all over the "treats" and enclosed container. Opened another package today and inspected them first thing. Yuck. Worm eggs evident already. Ugh. They must be manufacturing with infested ingredients lately.
customer_reviews.author: txjphy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t scrap teeth at all
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved the flavor of them. Went crazy for them. But they are not tough at all, both my dogs swallowed them easily. So no using them at all to scrap there teeth. Would not buy again. Didn’t do it’s purpose
customer_reviews.author: Michael Whelan JR

customer_reviews.title: My MaltiPoo loves Greenies
customer_reviews.text: My My 2 year old MaltiPoo will bark and turn circles and head to where the Greenies are kept when I ask her "you want a Greenie". Brings a smile and joy to my heart to see her get so excited about a treat. Can't way enough about them, best dog treat I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie O

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love these. We buy the Teenie size since both dogs try to devour the entire thing in one bite. I break them into even smaller pieces then give them a piece 2-3 times a day. Our poodle-mix is older (almost 9) and has dental problems so her breath is terrible. Our other dog is a 2 year old dachshund-mix and he just plain stinks everywhere. Dachshund owners understand this. He's a scavenger and with his short snout his breath can be even worse than the poodle's. These really do work, but only to a certain extent. But they like them as much as any treat we've tried so getting better breath is a major plus.
customer_reviews.author: WWTop Contributor: Baseball

customer_reviews.title: My dog is addicted to these
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't like most treats, when he goes to Bass Pro Shops the greater give him a bunch of different types of treats but he just politely takes them and puts them aside. However, when it comes to greenies he can't get enough. Not sure what's in them, probably some form of catnip for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: joec

customer_reviews.title: Dental aid? No.
customer_reviews.text: These "dental chew dog treats" do not aid in plaque prevention or removal. No way, no how. I know this from two years experience with my dogs, and two veterinarians. As a treat, dogs love 'em. But they should not be advertised as a dental chew that "cleans down to the gumline to prevent plaque and tartar". NO, they do not. Do NOT depend on these chews to keep your dog's teeth clean, especially if they eat soft/wet dog food. You really do need to brush the teeth regularly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Yay, for my 16yr old
customer_reviews.text: Only chew my 16yr old Shih Tzu will/can still eat. She is picky but still enjoys these. I don't think they help her teeth very much (didn't expect it to), but I have noticed improvement with her bad breath. Since I bought these for her just to enjoy, better breath is a nice bonus. These will not replace a toothbrush!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Renee Williams

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it, but what is the deal with a cup of shavings?
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these, and I have ordered them repeatedly. However, this order had almost a cup of shavings in one bag and definitely did not have the correct number of greenies. What do you do with this garbage except throw it in the garbage. I would normally give this 5 stars, but this is troublesome, they have quality control issues.
customer_reviews.author: joan

customer_reviews.title: Great little toothbrushes!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these little green toothbrushes! And they work.....just ask my vet! Between the Greenies & the dental chew sticks, both my dogs have had raving reviews from their vet. He is very pleased how well Buster & Haylee's teeth have improved. I always order more when I notice I'm getting low on the supply.
customer_reviews.author: D. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Dogs have been vomiting and having diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: Dogs have been vomiting and having diarrhea after eating this product from a subscribe vendor. I have tried to give them these treats for the past few months. I think they are potential hazards to dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My Australian Shepherd loves these. I don't ask him if he wants a treat, I ask him if he wants a Greenie! One of our vets recommended Greenies. I have not needed to have his teeth cleaned since he gets a Greenie every day. Obviously this is a repeat order!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Emily Blum

product_meta.title: Greenies Original Teenie Natural Dental Dog Treats (5-15 lb. dogs)
product_meta.description:
Size:22 TreatsOne GREENIES Original Dental Treat a day is all it takes for clean teeth, fresh breath, and a happy dog. Your dog can't wait to sink their teeth into these delicious, original-flavor dental dog breath chews because they feature a delightfully chewy texture that fights plaque and tartar. Irresistibly tasty and incredibly powerful, GREENIES Treats for Dogs are vet-recommended for at-home oral health care. Best of all, these natural dog breath treats are made with highly soluble ingredients that are safe and easy to digest. Give your dog the mouth-wowing treat that helps promote their overall health with GREENIES Dog Treats. Great for small breeds and little dogs between 5 and 15 lbs. Natural Dog Treats Plus Vitamins, Minerals, and Other Nutrients.

AMAZON.COM
GREENIES Canine Dental Chews are the number-one vet-recommended dental chew.* GREENIES Canine Dental Chews are proven to clean dogs’ teeth by fighting both plaque and tartar buildup, freshening breath, and maintaining healthier teeth and gums. Designed for daily treating, our dental chews are low in fat and nutritionally complete for adult dogs.
feature_bullets: Contains one (1) 6 oz. 22-count pack of GREENIES Original TEENIE Natural Dental Dog Treats; Natural Dog Treats Plus Vitamins, Minerals and Other Nutrients
The unique texture of GREENIES Dog Chews cleans down to the gumline to fight plaque and tartar and freshen bad dog breath
GREENIES Treats for Dogs are veterinarian recommended and VOHC accepted (Veterinary Oral Health Council)
Treat your small dog fantastically with the great taste of GREENIES Original Dental Treats
GREENIES Dog Treats are made with natural, easy-to-digest ingredients and are nutritionally complete

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
